name: TRINET USA, INC.
description: Provider of full-service human resources solutions to small- and medium-size businesses.
sampleDescriptions: Educate Members of Congress on the role professional employer organizations (PEO) play in delivering essential benefits.
Educate Members and the Administration on professional employee organizations (PEOs); advocate for PEOs to continue to provide human resource benefits to small- and medium-size business.
